item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Meta 正在洽谈规模 AI 投资，投资额可能高达 100 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日报道，Meta Platforms 正在洽谈对人工智能初创公司 Scale AI 的投资，金额可能超过 100 亿美元。【原文：Meta Platforms is in talks to make an investment that could exceed $10 billion in artificial intelligence startup Scale AI, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 特朗普称马斯克若资助民主党候选人将面临 "非常严重的后果" -NBC 新闻
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周六在接受 NBC 新闻采访时表示，如果亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克资助民主党候选人与投票支持特朗普全面减税法案的共和党人竞选，将会产生 "严重后果"。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump, in an interview with NBC News on Saturday, said there would be "serious consequences" if billionaire Elon Musk funds Democratic Party candidates to run against Republicans who vote for Trump's sweeping tax-cut bill.】

item.title: 格林：英格兰银行对通胀驼峰 "并不乐观
item.description: 英国央行货币政策制定者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）周六表示，英国央行仍预计英国通胀持续上升的势头将减弱，但在价格增长被证明比几年前预期的更为持久之后，英国央行对此 "并不乐观"。【原文：The Bank of England still expects the ongoing rise in UK inflation to fade but is "not sanguine" about it after price growth proved more persistent than anticipated only a few years ago, BoE monetary policymaker Megan Greene said on Saturday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔认为与美联储脱钩不会持久
item.description: 欧洲央行（ECB）董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）周六表示，美国和世界其他国家之间持续的贸易紧张局势对整个全球经济都是一个冲击，这意味着美联储和欧洲央行的货币政策不太可能长期存在分歧。【原文：Ongoing trade tensions between the United States and the rest of the world are a shock to the entire global economy, meaning the Federal Reserve's and the European Central Bank's monetary policies are unlikely to diverge for long, ECB board member Isabel Schnabel said on Saturday.】

item.title: 武伊契奇：如果预测成立，欧洲央行 "几乎完成 "减息计划
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（ECB）决策者鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）周六表示，如果通胀率如期稳定在 2%，欧洲中央银行 "几乎完成 "降息。【原文：The European Central Bank is "nearly done" cutting interest rates if inflation settles at 2% as expected, ECB policymaker Boris Vujcic said on Saturday.】

item.title: 吉利董事长称全球汽车业面临 "严重产能过剩
item.description: 吉利汽车（GEELY.UL）董事长兼创始人李书福周六表示，全球汽车行业正面临 "严重的产能过剩"，这家中国汽车制造商已决定不再新建生产厂或扩大现有工厂的生产规模。【原文：Geely's (GEELY.UL) chairman and founder Li Shufu said on Saturday that the global automotive industry was facing "serious overcapacity" and that the Chinese automaker had decided not to build new manufacturing plants or expand production in existing facilities.】

item.title: 台湾高级官员参观阿拉斯加液化天然气新项目现场
item.description: 一位台湾高级官员周六表示，他本周参观了阿拉斯加一个潜在的巨大液化天然气（LNG）新项目的现场。【原文：A senior Taiwanese official said on Saturday he had this week visited the site of a potentially enormous new liquified natural gas (LNG) project in Alaska that the Trump administration has been pushing hard to allies in Asia as a supply option.】

item.title: 中国称可能加快对欧盟稀土申请的审批
item.description: 中国周六表示，愿意加快对欧盟企业稀土出口的审批。【原文：China said on Saturday it was willing to accelerate the examination and approval of rare earth exports to European Union firms.】

item.title: 据《澳大利亚金融时报》报道，力拓正在为澳大利亚铝冶炼厂进行救助谈判
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》报道，全球矿业公司力拓正在与澳大利亚联邦政府和州政府谈判，为其位于新南威尔士州、陷入困境的 Tomago 铝冶炼厂提供数十亿美元的救助。【原文：Global miner Rio Tinto is in talks with Australian federal and state governments about a multibillion-dollar bailout for its struggling Tomago aluminium smelter in New South Wales state, the Australian Financial Review reported.】

item.title: Yageo 将于 6 月中旬与日本芝浦电子公司会面 - Yageo 董事长
item.description: 台湾雅居乐董事长周六表示，台湾雅居乐将于本月中旬在东京与日本芝浦电子公司会面，商讨合作事宜。【原文：Taiwan's Yageo will meet with Japan's Shibaura Electronics in the middle of this month in Tokyo to discuss cooperation, Yageo's chairman said on Saturday.】

item.title: 日本贸易谈判代表赤泽称在美国关税谈判中取得进展
item.description: 东京首席关税谈判代表表示，日本在与美国官员的第五轮贸易谈判中取得了一些进展，谈判的目的是终止损害日本经济的关税。【原文：Japan had made some progress in a fifth round of trade talks with U.S. officials aimed at ending tariffs that are hurting Japan's economy, Tokyo's chief tariff negotiator said.】

item.title: 分析师称朝鲜互联网遭遇重大故障
item.description: 一位驻英国的研究人员说，朝鲜的互联网在周六出现了严重的中断，并补充说原因可能是内部的，而不是网络攻击。【原文：North Korea's internet is experiencing a major outage on Saturday, said a UK-based researcher, adding that the cause may be may be internal rather than a cyberattack.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：EchoStar 准备在 FCC 审查期间申请破产
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五援引知情人士的话报道，EchoStar 正在考虑申请破产保护，因为这家电信服务公司正竭力保护其拥有的无线频谱许可证免遭联邦监管机构撤销的威胁。【原文：EchoStar is considering a Chapter 11 bankruptcy filing as the telecommunications services firm vies to shield its cache of wireless spectrum licenses from the threat of revocation by federal regulators, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国农业部编辑贸易分析报告引发对报告完整性的担忧
item.description: 根据路透社对四位分析师的采访，在美国农业部推迟发布一份报告并排除了将关税作为农产品贸易逆差预计增加原因的调查结果之后，分析师们本周对美国农业部报告的完整性表示了担忧。【原文：Analysts voiced concerns this week about the integrity of U.S. Department of Agriculture reports after the agency delayed a report and excluded findings that point to tariffs as a reason for a forecasted increase in the agricultural trade deficit, according to Reuters interviews with four analysts.】

item.title: 特朗普称美联储主席人选将很快出炉
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，下一任美联储主席的人选很快就会有决定，并补充说，一个好的美联储主席会降低利率。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Friday that a decision on the next Federal Reserve chair will be coming out soon, adding that a good Fed chair would lower interest rates.】

item.title: 特朗普称中国习近平同意重启稀土矿产品流通
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五表示，中国国家主席习近平已同意重新启动向美国输送稀土矿物和磁铁。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday that Chinese President Xi Jinping had agreed to restart the flow of rare earth minerals and magnets to the United States.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：特斯拉 Optimus 人形机器人项目负责人离职
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引一位知情人士的话报道，特斯拉 "擎天柱 "项目负责人米兰-科瓦奇（Milan Kovac）即将离职，这给首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的仿人机器人项目带来了不确定性。【原文：The head of Tesla's Optimus program, Milan Kovac, is leaving the company, casting uncertainty over chief executive Elon Musk's humanoid robot project, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易日：市场崛起
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: Gol 退出破产保护程序，计划增加新航线并扩大机队规模
item.description: 巴西 Gol 航空公司首席执行官塞尔索-费雷尔（Celso Ferrer）告诉路透社记者，该公司周五正式结束了在美国的破产程序，为机队扩张以及在巴西和其他国家开设新航班和新航线创造了条件。【原文：Brazilian airline Gol formally exited its bankruptcy proceedings in the United States on Friday, setting the stage for fleet expansion and new flights and routes within Brazil and other countries, Chief Executive Officer Celso Ferrer told Reuters.】

item.title: 关税战趋于缓和，波音准备恢复向中国交付飞机
item.description: 根据 FlightRadar24 网站上的飞行记录，一架涂有厦门航空公司涂装的新型波音 737 MAX 飞机于周五离开西雅图，飞往该公司在中国的交付中心。【原文：A new Boeing 737 MAX painted with Xiamen Airlines livery left Seattle on Friday on the first leg of the route used to shuttle jets to the company's delivery center in China, according to flight records on FlightRadar24.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，英国泰晤士水务公司将获得 Silver Point 和 Elliott 超过 135 亿美元的救援交易
item.description: 彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道称，美国投资公司银点资本（Silver Point Capital）和埃利奥特管理公司（Elliott Management）正在为英国泰晤士水务公司制定一项价值 100 多亿英镑（约合 135.3 亿美元）的拯救计划。【原文：U.S. investment firms Silver Point Capital and Elliott Management are formulating a 10-billion-pound-plus ($13.53 billion) rescue package for Britain's Thames Water, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贝克休斯称美国石油/天然气钻井平台数量连续第 6 周下降至 2021 年低点
item.description: 能源服务公司贝克休斯（Baker Hughes）周五在其密切关注的报告中称，美国能源公司本周连续第六周削减石油和天然气钻井平台数量，这是自2023年9月以来的首次。【原文：U.S. energy firms this week cut the number of oil and natural gas rigs operating for a sixth week in a row for the first time since September 2023, energy services firm Baker Hughes said in its closely followed report on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普与马斯克的口水战打击特斯拉股价，散户交易员抢购特斯拉股票
item.description: 散户投资者似乎从美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与其前盟友、特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）之间突如其来的争斗中发现了商机，在这家电动汽车制造商的股票因激烈的对峙而暴跌时，他们纷纷抢购。【原文：Retail investors seem to have spotted an opportunity in the sudden feud between U.S. President Donald Trump and his former ally, Tesla CEO Elon Musk, scooping up shares of the electric car maker as they tumbled on the acrimonious standoff.】

item.title: 对华出口受限，美国乙烷船停滞不前
item.description: 据贸易消息来源和周五的船舶跟踪数据显示，在华盛顿要求美国出口商申请将页岩气运往中国这一最大买家的许可证之后，超过半打原本驶往中国的美国装载乙烷的船舶在美国墨西哥湾沿岸停滞不前。【原文：Over half a dozen U.S.-loaded ethane vessels, originally bound for China, have stalled around the U.S. Gulf Coast after Washington requested U.S. exporters seek licenses to ship the shale gas to the top buyer, according to trade sources and ship tracking data on Friday.】

item.title: 埃尼公司与 YPF 签署协议参与阿根廷液化天然气项目
item.description: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼和阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊在罗马会晤期间，意大利能源集团埃尼和阿根廷 YPF 周五签署了关于阿根廷液化天然气（ARGLNG）项目的协议。【原文：Italian energy group Eni and Argentina's YPF on Friday signed an agreement on the Argentina LNG (ARGLNG) project during a meeting in Rome between Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni and Argentine President Javier Milei.】

item.title: 壳牌报告宾夕法尼亚壳牌石化联合企业熔炉装置发生火灾
item.description: 壳牌周五表示，6月4日下午2:20左右，壳牌宾夕法尼亚石化联合企业五号炉发生火灾。【原文：Shell on Friday said that at approximately 2:20 p.m. on June 4, a fire occurred at furnace unit number five at the Shell Pennsylvania Petrochemicals Complex.】

item.title: 特朗普-马斯克诱发特斯拉下滑，凸显巨量股票带来的市场风险
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与特斯拉公司总裁埃隆-马斯克之间的裂痕作为一出政治大戏吸引了全世界的目光，但同时也成为华尔街的一大奇观，凸显了全球最大的股票给股市带来的风险。【原文：The rift between President Donald Trump and Tesla chief Elon Musk has captivated the world as a political drama, but it has also become a Wall Street spectacle, highlighting the risk to equity markets from the world's biggest stocks.】

item.title: 前曼哈顿美国律师威廉姆斯离开保罗-魏斯律师事务所
item.description: 前曼哈顿联邦检察官达米安-威廉姆斯（Damian Williams）已经离开了他于今年 1 月加入的保罗-魏斯律师事务所，成为这家华尔街律所自 3 月与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普达成协议取消针对该律所的行政命令以来，最新一位离职的合伙人。【原文：Former Manhattan U.S. Attorney Damian Williams has left Paul Weiss, the law firm he joined in January, becoming the latest partner to depart the Wall Street firm since it struck a deal with U.S. President Donald Trump in March to rescind an executive order against it.】

item.title: 危机动摇，瑞士束缚了瑞银的全球梦想
item.description: 瑞士周五宣布进行改革，使其最大的银行瑞银集团（UBS）更加安全，避免再次发生危机。【原文：Switzerland announced reforms on Friday to make its biggest bank UBS safer and avoid another crisis, hampering the global ambitions of a lender whose financial weight eclipses the country's economy.】

item.title: 监管负担减轻，标普全球 "看好 "富国银行
item.description: S&P Global周五表示，将富国银行的评级展望从 "稳定 "上调至 "积极"，这家美国银行本周早些时候被解除了1.95万亿美元的资产上限。【原文：S&P Global upgraded its outlook on Wells Fargo to "positive" from "stable", the ratings provider said on Friday, after the U.S. bank was released from a $1.95 trillion asset cap earlier this week.】
